distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libxml2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2016-4658: Use after free via namespace node in XPointer ranges (bsc#1005544).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: xpointer.c in libxml2 before 2.9.5 (as used in Apple iOS before 10, OS X before 10.12, tvOS before 10, and watchOS before 3, and other products) does not forbid namespace nodes in XPointer ranges, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (use-after-free and memory corruption) via a crafted XML document.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
